dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5382 IH: HUD Equity Action Plan Elimination Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Self (for himself and Mr. Rosendale) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services, and in addition to the Committee on the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To prohibit funding for implementation of the Equity Action Plan of the Department of Housing and Urban Development, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the HUD Equity Action Plan Elimination Act of 2023.

Beginning on the date of the enactment of this Act and notwithstanding any other provision of law, no Federal funds may be obligated or expended to implement or carry out the Equity Action Plan of the Department of Housing and Urban Development.

The Congress disapproves the proposed rule of the Department of Housing and Urban Development relating to Affirmatively Furthering Fair Housing, published in the Federal Register on February 9, 2023 (88 Fed. Reg. 8516; Docket No. FR–6250–P–01), such Department may not issue a final rule based on or substantially similar to such proposed rule, and such proposed rule and any final rule based on or substantially similar to such proposed rule shall have no force or effect.
